cards.description: A collection of all cards in the game, defining their properties, effects, and behaviors.

artist.description: The artist who created the card art to give credit when the card details are shwon.

can_ability_target_other_floors.description: Whether this card's ability can target other floors.

card_art_reference.description: Reference to the card's artwork asset. This is either a reference to a game object, or an asset guid to reuse vanilla card art.

card_type.description: The type of card this is.

class.description: The clan this card belongs to, leave unset for clanless.

cooldown.description: The amount of cooldown applied after the ability is activated. This value can be modfied during gameplay.

cost.description: Ember required to play this card.

cost_type.description: The type of cost this card uses.

descriptions.description: Localized text descriptions for this card.

effect_triggers.description: This field acts as a parameter to CardEffectAddTrigger, which allows adding a character_trigger to a character. Items are references to a CharacterTrigger

effects.description: List of effects this card has when played.

items.description: Reference to an effect's unique identifier.

hide_in_logbook.description: Whether this card should be hidden in the logbook.

ignore_when_counting_mastery.description: Whether this card counts towards class mastery.

initial_cooldown.description: Initial cooldown value when the card is first added to the deck.

initial_keyboard_target.description: Initial target when the card is selected when using a gamepad or keyboard.

initial_upgrades.description: List of upgrades that are applied when the card is first added to the deck.

items.description: Reference to an upgrade's unique identifier.

is_an_ability.description: Whether this card represents a unit ability.

linked_mastery_card.description: Used when a card has different variations (Think Blazing Bolts from MT1) the masteries are all linked to the original variation.

lore_tooltips.description: List of lore tooltips that appear when hovering over this card.

names.description: Localized text for this card's name.

off_cooldown_vfx.description: Vfx used when card is off cooldown.

override.description: Whether this card overrides an existing card with the same ID.

pools.description: List of card pools this card can appear in.

rarity.description: The rarity of this card. This can be set to either common, uncommon, rare, or champion. The other rarites are not used for cards. (Starter cards are common rarity)

required_dlc.description: The DLC this card belongs to.

shared_discovery_cards.description: List of cards that are discovered together with this card.

shared_mastery_cards.description: List of cards that share mastery progress with this card.

special_edge_vfx.description: VFX used on the edge of the card.

targetless.description: Whether this card requires a target.

targets_room.description: Whether this card targets an entire room.

traits.description: List of traits this card has.

items.description: Reference to a trait's unique identifier.

triggers.description: List of triggers this card has.

items.description: Reference to a trigger's unique identifier.

unlock_level.description: The level at which this card becomes available to appear in card drafts.

items.description: A card definition that specifies all properties and behaviors of a card in the game.
